feed.title: ZTNET Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Allow for non-standard Postgres port to be used (#544)
  • Return node data from controller as first priority. (#548)
  • Don't send auth when both user and pass are empty (#566)
  • Add Russian Language Support (#562)
  • Update linux.md (#577)
  • Improved smtp mail handler (#582)

📝 Documentation

  • Update linux.md (#577)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.0...0.7.1

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @antoniomika, @marat2509, @owopeachy and @starlightcrafted 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.2
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Fixed typo in en/"privateCardContent" (#583)
  • fix: Correct the reboot command on Windows (#591)
  • Update zerotier to 1.14.2 (#592)
  • Bump cookie from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0 (#568)
  • Updated docs for keycloak oauth (#601)
  • Fix missing translations (#599)
  • Added email verification icon and lastseen to admin user-table. (#604)
  • Update common.json (#606)
  • Improved global node naming (#607)
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.17.0 to 0.31.0 in /ztnodeid (#602)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

📝 Documentation

  • fix: Correct the reboot command on Windows (#591)
  • Update zerotier to 1.14.2 (#592)
  • Bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 in /docs (#575)
  • Bump elliptic from 6.5.4 to 6.6.0 in /docs (#578)
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /docs (#594)
  • Bump send and express in /docs (#595)
  • Bump serve-static and express in /docs (#596)
  • Bump express from 4.18.2 to 4.21.2 in /docs (#597)
  • Bump cookie and express in /docs (#569)
  • Bump webpack from 5.89.0 to 5.97.1 in /docs (#598)
  • Updated docs for keycloak oauth (#601)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

📦 Installer

  • Bump serve-static and express in /install.ztnet (#574)
  • Bump send and express in /install.ztnet (#572)
  • Bump path-to-regexp and express in /install.ztnet (#573)
  • Bump path-to-regexp and express in /install.ztnet (#593)
  • Bump body-parser and express in /install.ztnet (#571)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.1...0.7.2

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @Msprg, @Ns2Kracy, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @tinola 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.3
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Added tot/act for members in the Network table. (#610)
  • Use sparse checkout during installation (#613)
  • Added new table layout and notes for Managed Routes. (#617)
  • Updated Polish translations (#618)
  • Added info for custom root and mobile limitation (#620)

📝 Documentation

  • Added info for custom root and mobile limitation (#620)
  • Bump elliptic from 6.6.0 to 6.6.1 in /docs (#631)
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.8 in /docs (#603)
  • Bump serialize-javascript from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 in /docs (#630)

📦 Installer

  • Use sparse checkout during installation (#613)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.2...0.7.3

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @tinola 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.4
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • refactor: enhance modal confirmations for IP assignment actions (#634)
  • Optimize network list loading performance by using stored authorization status (#647)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.3...0.7.4

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @Alg0rix 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.5
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Bump next from 15.1.2 to 15.2.4 (#657)
  • Use dynamic logo image import (#660)
  • Bump formidable from 3.5.1 to 3.5.4 (#649)
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.11 (#661)
  • Bump axios from 1.7.4 to 1.8.2 (#642)
  • Bump @babel/runtime from 7.24.0 to 7.27.0 (#644)
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.31.0 to 0.35.0 in /ztnodeid (#646)
  • New feature, backup and restore (#666)
  • Remind the user to restart the ZeroTier container after restoring from a backup. (#667)

📝 Documentation

  • Bump @babel/runtime-corejs3 from 7.23.2 to 7.27.1 in /docs (#658)
  • Bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.7 to 2.0.9 in /docs (#648)
  • Bump @babel/runtime from 7.23.2 to 7.27.1 in /docs (#656)
  • Bump prismjs from 1.29.0 to 1.30.0 in /docs (#640)
  • Bump @babel/helpers from 7.23.2 to 7.26.10 in /docs (#643)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.4...0.7.5

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @dependabot and @dependabot[bot] 🎉
